t: Thai SELECT Products – Siam Store - Thai & Asian Food Market
s: Thai SELECT is a mark of certification awarded by the Ministry of Commerce The Royal Thai Government to guarantee the authentic Thai taste of Thai food products. Over 90 Thai brands have received this award, for example, Healthy Boy (Dek Som boon), Lobo, Madam Pum, Mae Ploy, Maepranom, ...

s: I am a big fan of Thai food and there is a lot of it where I live. Perhaps this is why I've never had anything made by this brand that I would buy again! I found this on sale at Big Lots and decided to give it a try...EEEEEEK! I don't blame the company for this assault on my taste buds.
